message: Initial reaction is that it might be better to just have the group be private (there's support for that already) and then just have each student sign a form or whatever produced by the school itself.

just ran into this with a school group, but we want to limit people from cheating, or at least cover our asses if they do.  as an admin I'd like to be able to either sticky that post and make it uneditable or make it a separate page to sign and agree to before joining.
That's what we have ended up doing, but it might be nice for other purposes to have admins be able to do the standard lock and sticky functions.
